mapper.insert: insert into reply( reply_num, user_id, content, reg_date, board_num ) values( #{reply_num}, #{user_id}, #{content}, #{reg_date}, #{board_num} )
mapper.select: select * from reply where board_num = #{board_num} order by reg_date desc limit #{start},#{end}
select reply_num from reply order by reg_date desc limit 1;
